channel.title: Server status page suggestion
channel.description:
I think we should be able to add feedback to a server on the status page if you fit certain requirements, like being here for 2 months or something. Just for the hell of it, I decided to try out a server. I wasn't gonna do to much, so I found a 525 purely pvp, get 2 drops from a kill, ect. Here is my experience:
I login to be met by about 7 players, 3 of which are staff. First that happens is admin teleports us all to jad without warning. I almost die, barely get out. Dick move. So I'm slowly pking, trying to earn cash and items so I can get better armor. Some noob logs in and keeps saying "50m plz". The admins then spawn him full bandos, ags, d claws, etc. Pretty rediculous, considering I've been working my ass off to get kills for the past 35 minutes. Later, some guy keeps telling me to stop "rushing". To me, rushing is charging up to someone, firing some kinda magic shit, then doing like a d claw spec. I walk over to him, stood there for a good 4 seconds, then used a dds spec. He goes and starts bitching, and I say "dude, chill out it's only a game. I rarely play p servers, I don't care what I do." As a result, the owner then mutes me. That was rediculous. I didn't do anyhing, you jerk. So I try to keep playing for a bit. The owner then teleports everyone into lvl 55 wildy, and we cant teleport out. Alot of us die, I manage to run to magebank. Owner teleports everyone to wilderness again. More casualties. Later, one of the admins is like " I bet reyx7 is just "1 h1t u", you should probably IP him. With no questions, I'm IPed.
Now, I would LOVE to write a review on the status page about how the staff are jerks and how it's shittily coded (most npcs cant do anything, meleeing doesn't auto follow) But, unfortunately, I can't. so, anyone else support the idea?

item.title: Server status page suggestion
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

3 way tie. fun fun fun.
The only people who would say no are 12 yr old owners who ban anyone who calls them a fag.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page suggestion
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

yeah good idea, i posted this on the server status feedback page thing a while ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page suggestion
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

Thats is an AMAZING idea, whoever denies reviews on the status page is just not being realistic.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page suggestion
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I think this would be a good addition as it would allow us to know which ones are pure crap.

Read full topic
